name: In re NOMINATION PAPERS OF Charlie L. WARREN, II, as an Independent Candidate for School Director of the Board of School Directors of the Chester Upland School District. Petition of Marrea D. Walker-Smith
name_abbreviation: In re Nomination Papers of Warren

parties: In re NOMINATION PAPERS OF Charlie L. WARREN, II, as an Independent Candidate for School Director of the Board of School Directors of the Chester Upland School District. Petition of Marrea D. Walker-Smith.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED and the Commonwealth Court’s Order is REVERSED based on In re Benkoski mid, Stewart, 594 Pa. 37, 934 A.2d 1150, 785, 786 MAL 2007, 2007 WL 2938186 (2007), reversing 932 A.2d 1023 (2007).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
934 A.2d 1160
In re NOMINATION PAPERS OF Charlie L. WARREN, II, as an Independent Candidate for School Director of the Board of School Directors of the Chester Upland School District. Petition of Marrea D. Walker-Smith.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 22, 2007.
